officialTitle: Pilot Study on the Feasibility of Cryotherapy as an Alternative Treatment for Phyllodes Tumors/Breast Fibroepithelial Lesions (FELs) Needing Surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* lesion seen on ultrasound
* core biopsy revealed FEL of B3
* lesion \</+3.5cm
* keen for cryotherapy instead of surgery
* has other breast lesions for followup

Exclusion Criteria:

* cancer patients
* patients with bleeding diathesis
* lesions causing visible breast deformity
